work.summary: Developer and architect of onboarding project, building a new automatic website creation tool.
highlights: Extensive algorithm performance and memory optimization work. Reduced running time by 98%.
Built node.js backend server using Sails.js and managed migration from Parse.com.
Designed and implemented an automatic typesetting engine.

work.summary: Developed an editable interactive math textbook.
highlights: Created a DSL for building webpages with interactive graphs and other widgets, using Angular.js and JSXGraph.
Designed and built CMS to manage and edit individual copies of the book, using Ruby on Rails.

work.summary: Developed an eCommerce Android app POC.
highlights: Implemented product image recognition using Recognize.im api.

work.summary: Worked on social marketing platform, using Java, GWT & PHP
